info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued January 15 at 12:40PM CST until January 16 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM CST TUESDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 21 possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, south central, southwest and west central Louisiana and southeast Texas. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, from 3 AM to 9 AM CST Tuesday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Tuesday morning through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
